articles.title: European postal services suspend shipment of packages to US over import tariffs - AP News
articles.description: Multiple postal services around Europe say they are suspending the shipment of many packages to the United States amid a lack of clarity over new import duties. Postal services in Germany, Denmark, Sweden and Italy say they will stop shipping most merchandise…
articles.content: ATHENS, Greece (AP) The end of an exemption on tariff duties for low-value packages coming into the United States is causing multiple international postal services to pause shipping as they await mor… [+4216 chars]
